Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:塔

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+5854

Main pronunciation 主要发音: tǎ

Other pronunciations 其它发音: tǎ,dā

Original meaning 本义: Meaning tower.

English senses 英语理解: tower, spire, tall building

Usage example 用法举例: 塔吊 tǎ diào (tower crane)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 1197

Shuowen 说文解字: 西域浮屠也從土荅聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 塔 mutant 墖 from potters-clay 土 tǔ and phonetic bean-plant 荅 dā (rem+ 合 hé) and (rem+ 田 tián looks like tower) C560 塔<墖> simp 塔.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- 合 on top of 田 looks like a tower)

墖字的基本解释

墖
tǎ
古同“塔”。

墖字的汉语字典释义

[①]［tǎ］
［《廣韻》吐盍切，入盍，透。］
亦作“墖1”。
(1)“佛塔”的简称。佛塔起源于印度，梵语为“窣堵坡”（stūpa），晋宋译经时造为“塔”字，见于晋葛洪《字苑》、南朝梁顾野王《玉篇》等书。用以收藏舍利。后亦用于收藏经卷、佛像、法器，庄严佛寺等。
(2)谓葬僧尼。
(3)塔形的建筑物。
(4)量词。犹块。
(5)象声词。参见“塔然”。
[②]［da˙］
见“圪2塔”。

墖字的康熙字典解释

【補遺】【丑集】【土字部】　墖； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页238第19
【字彙補】《帝京景物略》，與塔同。

墖字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
墖字的起名意思

暂无。

墖
Basic explanation of words
墖
tǎ
Gutong "Tower".
墖
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［tǎ］
["Guangyun" cuts into the spit, enters the spit, and penetrates. ]
Also known as "墖1".
(1) The abbreviation of "Stupa". The stupa originated in India. It is called "窣都坡" (stūpa) in Sanskrit. It was built as "tower" when translating the scriptures in the Jin and Song Dynasties. It was found in Gehong's "Character Garden" of Jin Gehong and "Yu Pian" of King Gu Ye of the Southern Dynasty . Used to store relics. Later it was also used for the collection of scriptures, Buddha statues, Dharma implements, and solemn Buddhist temples.
(2) It is called burial of monks and nuns.
(3) Tower-shaped buildings.
(4) Quantifiers. Still block.
(5) Onomatopoeia. See "Taran".
[②]［da˙］
See "Ge 2 Tower".
墖
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Addendum] [Chou Ji] [Tu Zi Department] 　墖; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 238 Page 19
[Word Supplement] "Scene of the Imperial Capital", same as the tower.
